body.name: Dash Cam Hardwire Kit, Car Dash Camera Type C Charger Hard Wire Kit for Dashcam DC 12-24V to 5V/3A Low Voltage Protection 24h Parking Surveillance with Fuse Tap for Car Dashcam, GPS, Radar (Type C)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.

FREE delivery Monday, February 26 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 🚗★【Universal Dash Cam Hardwire Kit】This dash cam hard wire power charging cable kit is a universal model for most onboard dash cameras, GPS, radar, and dash cams on the market

🚗★【24/7 Non-Stop Surveillance】 The dashcam hardwire cable can connect to the car fuse box to power the onboard dash cam and keep it 24hrs surveillance; Also the dash cam hard wire kit will cut off the power supply when the car battery drops to 11.6V or 23.5V to prevent the battery drain out

🚗★ 【ACC Turn On Mode】 If you don't want the dash cam to record 24/7, you can install this dash cam hardwire kit in the ACC+ fuse slot to operate the ACC turn-on mode, which the dashcam will only be powered when the car turns on (RECOMMEND this Mode when you need to park the car for over a week or a longer time)

🚗★【Clean and Space Saving】 By using this dash cam hardwire kit you can easily hide the wire and cable to make your carpet look wire-free and clean; also this dash cam charger doesn't occupy your car's cigarette lighter port and allow you can use the port to charge other devices in your car

🚗★ 【Installation Note】 It is always recommended to ask for professional assistance when you are not sure how to hardwire the kit with the dashcam, the installation will require some basic electric and wiring knowledge about your vehicle.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Car On-Dash Mounted Camera Hardwire Kit Winscon Dash Cam Hardwire Kit Features: 1. Universal model and compatible with DC 12-24V for most cars and trucks on the market. 2. 24/7 non-stop parking surveillance mode and ACC mode (Please decided the mode in the installation process by using different fuse slots). 3. Well-build quality with low voltage protection to prevent the car battery drained. 4. Connect to the car battery as the power source, save your carpet 12V or 24V outlet free, and allow you to charge other on-car devices. 5. Please make sure your dash cam charging connector type, and select the correct type. 6. IMPORTANT: If the hardwire kit does not provide power, please try to insert the fuse tap in the OPPOSITE direction. (Due to the car fuse slot having positive and negative poles)

24hrs Surveillance Dash cam Hardwire Kit Specification: Connector: Please select the correct connector type for your Dash camInput Voltage: DC 12V-24VOutput Voltage: 5VOutput Current: 3AWorking Temperature:-40~ 160 Degrees FCable Length: 11.5ft/3.5mLow Voltage Protection: 11.6V for 12V vehicle; 23.5V for 24V vehicle.Color: Black

Dashcam Hardwire Cable Installation Steps: 1. Use your owner’s manual to identify the location of the internal fuse box. This is normally found by the foot well on the driver’s side of your vehicle or under the engine hood. 2. Open the fuse box cover plate to find the fuse map. Locate the Fuse Box and find a Constant Fuse Slot, or ACC Fuse Slot(for NOT USE 24/7 Surveillance Mode). 3. Remove the fuse from the constant fuse slot and insert it into the bottom slot of the fuse we provide the same size. (IMPORTANT: Remember to insert your car's original fuse into the fuse tap if applicable) Use the circuit test pen to identify the positive pole of the fuse slot. 4. Connect the Yellow LINE to the positive pole of the constant fuse slot, or ACC Fuse Slot(for NOT USE 24/7 Surveillance Mode). 5. Connect the RED LINE of the hardwire kit to the positive pole of the ACC fuse slot in the fuse box. ACC fuse slot energizes only when the ignition switch is on. (IMPORTANT: Remember to insert your car's original fuse into the fuse tap if applicable.) 6. IMPORTANT: If the hardwire kit does not provide power, please try to insert the fuse tap in the OPPOSITE direction.

7. Connect the Black Wire(Ground Wire) and screw connect it to any non-coated metal bolt. 8. Before hiding the charger cable, connect the power cable to Dash Cam to make sure the device can be powered on and work normally. IMPORTANT: If the hardwire kit does not provide power, please try to insert the fuse tap in the OPPOSITE direction. (Due to the car fuse slot having positive and negative poles) 9. Wire and hide the extra dash cam power charging cable, and connect it to the onboard dash cam or other devices, then the installation is completed.

Package Included: Winscon 11.5ft Dash Cam Hardwire Kit *1 Mini/LP ACN Fuse Add-A-Circuit Fuse Holder *2Mini ACS Fuse Add-A-Circuit Fuse Holder *2ATO ACU Fuse Add-A-Circuit Fuse Holder *2Micro2 Fuse Add-A-Circuit Fuse Holder *2 Auto Circuit Test Pencil *1Fuse Clip *1 Opening Tool Bar *1Cable Ties *4Adhesive Cable Organizers *4

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is cheap for what you are getting, and quality of the fuses aren’t cheap

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars KEEP IT UP GOOD JOB

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worked great with second kit
reviews.reviewText: So my initial kit that I got had bad crimps so the connection was intermittent and not constant but I had a replacement kit sent out and I had no issues with the install and my dash cam is now permanently wired and the cables completely hidden.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, I like it says about voltage protection information
reviews.reviewText: I like it says about voltage protection information, clear instruction, tester is included, the only thing I wish they have instead of small blue plastic stick to put in the box normal lever for easier wire work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did not work for me.
reviews.reviewText: I have a good understanding of electrical wiring and have worked in the industry for years. I bought this kit to power a VanTrue Dashcam. Installation is very straight forward and easy. In my case, I modified the kit by adding a switch on the Batt wire to be able to disable 24 Parking mode while in my garage. No matter what I did, this first kit would not work. Since I had modified it, I choose to simply order a second kit. This second kit worked only when the Batt wire was connected and switched on and would not work via the ACC wire. I can only assume both items are defective and as such can not recommend this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Came with everything required to power a dashcam.
reviews.reviewText: Contained all the parts required to properly test for fuse box power, adaptors to accommodate fuse types and run cable to headliner. Cables are definitely long enough for any install and appear to be of a high enough gauge to handle current draw.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does not work with Rove R2-4K camera
reviews.reviewText: Wired it correctly and parking mode will not enable - not sure what’s different about the Rove hardwire kit but if parking mode is important than get it instead of a 3rd party kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Work good. Have enough connectors to do the job.
